summary: Three kids who travel back in time to 65 million years ago, where they are taken in by a dinosaur.
cast: Rob Schneider|Pamela Adlon|Grey Griffin|Tara Strong|Jane Lynch|Melanie Griffith|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|William Baldwin|Stephen Baldwin|Kari Wahlgren|Tom Kenny|John DiMaggio|Nolan North|Dee Bradley Baker|Dawnn Lewis|Yuri Lowenthal|Roger Craig Smith|Fred Tatasciore|Ben Diskin|Jessica DiCicco|Melanie Abramoff|Jamie Simone|Megan Lovegren
title: Dino Time
